title: Font ID? Rockwell??
content:
Can someone help. Stumped?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020153im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cherubs_5426.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Square slab in They Might Be Giants "Ana Ng." ad - CG Geometric {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020153/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42450 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pretty Outline Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905020153/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42624 "Go to next forum topic")
author: etoth1

comments.content: I was asking about this typeface (not this showing) the other day and no one had an answer. I hope you get some help. I ended up using ITC Clearface.

Looks a little like Palatino Black with some manipulation. But I don’t think that’s it, the B is different.

edit.. No, Im completely off on that.
